ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard% was (Patch message)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... no, we re simply debating the basis for a choice, not the choice itself.  i maintain that choices are not always based on a reward given to work required
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:05 PM 2/26/01 -0700, you wrote:
>No, that would be true if I chose not to be a pitcher because I wanted to be
>a shortstop. The people analogous to me not choosing to play baseball are
>the people who choose not to play EQ at all but play MW4 instead or bowling
>for that matter.

no, we're simply debating the basis for a choice, not the choice itself. i maintain
that choices are not always based on a reward given to work required comparison.
and if they are not, then your argument stating that bards are underpowered because
they have fewer people playing them is not a valid argument.
